import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import "./UserProfile.scss" const UserProfile: React.FC = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", password_confirmation: "" }) const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState({ name: "", address: "", date: "", phone: "", }) interface ParamTypes { id: string } const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { const requestUrl = "/api/v1/users/" + id; async function fetchUser() { await axios.get(requestUrl) .then(res => { const resJSON = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(res.data)); setUser(resJSON.user); setUserProfile(esJSON.user_profile) }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } fetchUser(); }, []) return (
